attributes.action: ensure that no lottery funding is used to bail out the 2012 Olympics in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is currently one dedicated lottery to help fund the London 2012 Olympics.  Therefore people wanting to contribute to the 2012 London Olympics can.  I do not and I want the PM to ensure that the current spiralling costs are not met by the general lottery fund.  The alternative would be to put wheels in motion to encourage people to stop playing the lottery.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
